title: Road traffic counts from 2023 on Archer Lane and surrounding roads

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please send the raw data from the traffic counts carried out in 2023 for Archer Lane and feeder roads in the area.  I received an email from Michelle Moffat in October saying these have been carried out.  This is in keeping with the process of cancelling this ATN and opening Archer Lane in Oct 2022.
Many thanks,
Christina Rhys

Dear Christina Rhys,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Road traffic counts
from 2023 on Archer Lane and surrounding roads which we received on
27/11/2024.
As your request is a request for information relating to the environment,
this has been logged as a request under the Environmental Information
Regulations 2004 (EIR) and will be dealt with under the Regulations. The
reference number for your request can be found above.
The Environmental Information Regulations 2004 state that we must respond
to you within 20 working days, by 30/12/2024. Please do not hesitate to
contact us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [1][Sheffield City Council request email]
From: Christina Rhys <[FOI #1207860 email]>
Sent: 27 November 2024 07:03
To: FOI <[Sheffield City Council request email]>
Subject: Freedom of Information request - Road traffic counts from 2023 on
Archer Lane and surrounding roads
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please send the raw data from the traffic counts carried out in 2023 for
Archer Lane and feeder roads in the area.  I received an email from
Michelle Moffat in October saying these have been carried out.  This is in
keeping with the process of cancelling this ATN and opening Archer Lane in
Oct 2022.
Many thanks,
Christina Rhys
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Please use this email address for all replies to this request:
[2][FOI #1207860 email]
Is [3][Sheffield City Council request email] the wrong address for Freedom
of Information requests to Sheffield City Council? If so, please contact
us using this form:
[4]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
Disclaimer: This message and any reply that you make will be published on
the internet. Our privacy and copyright policies:
[5]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
For more detailed guidance on safely disclosing information, read the
latest advice from the ICO:
[6]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
[7]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
Please note that in some cases publication of requests and responses will
be delayed.
If you find this service useful as an FOI officer, please ask your web
manager to link to us from your organisation's FOI page.
